html.label: Intro
html.p:
Hello and welcome to our survey!
Thank you in advance for your participation. This study is very important to us and we ask that you answer each question carefully and completely.
While going through the survey, please use the scroll bar on the right and bottom of your screen to move up and down through questions and images. Please remember that there are no right or wrong answers. We are only interested in your opinions. 
Thank you again! Let’s begin…

checkbox.label: S_PastParticipation
checkbox.title: Have you participated in a market research study within the past 2 weeks, on any of the following topics?

checkbox.label: S_Industry
checkbox.title: Do you, or does anyone in your immediate family work for any of the following industries?
checkbox.row: Advertising agency or public relations firms
A graphic design or packaging firm
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution, or sale of candy/salty snack products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution, or sale of fabric softener/laundry detergent products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution, or sale of refrigerated coffee drinks/creamer products

term.label: TERM_Industry
term.cond: (S_Industry.r1 or S_Industry.r2 or S_Industry.r3 or S_Industry.r6)

select.label: S_GroceryShop
select.title: How much of the household’s refrigerated coffee creamer shopping do you, yourself, do?

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: Which of the following best describes how you identify?

number.label: S_Age
number.title: Please type in your age below.

radio.label: STANDARD_ETHNICITY
radio.title: Which of the following best describes you?
radio.row: Black or African American, or Black British

checkbox.label: STANDARD_ETHNICITY2
checkbox.title: Please select all of the following that describe you.
checkbox.row: Black or African American, or Black British

radio.title: How often have you purchased products in each of the following categories?

radio.label: v_FreqBreakfastCereal
radio.title: Virtual for Weighting - Breakfast Cereal Frequency - DO NOT MODIFY
radio.virtual: if S_Frequency.r1.c1: data.val=0 if S_Frequency.r1.c2: data.val=1 if S_Frequency.r1.c3: data.val=2 if S_Frequency.r1.c4: data.val=3 if S_Frequency.r1.c5: data.val=4 if S_Frequency.r1.c6: data.val=5 if S_Frequency.r1.c7: data.val=6

radio.title: Virtual for Weighting - Refrigerated Coffee Creamer Frequency - DO NOT MODIFY
radio.virtual: if S_Frequency.r2.c1: data.val=0 if S_Frequency.r2.c2: data.val=1 if S_Frequency.r2.c3: data.val=2 if S_Frequency.r2.c4: data.val=3 if S_Frequency.r2.c5: data.val=4 if S_Frequency.r2.c6: data.val=5 if S_Frequency.r2.c7: data.val=6

radio.label: S_CoffeeEnthusiast
radio.title: Please read the pair of phrases below and think about which one best describes your coffee drinking experience. The closer you feel to the situation on the left, the lower the number you would give it (e.g., 1 or 2). The closer you feel to the situation on the right, the higher the number you would give it (e.g, 4 or 5). If you don’t feel that either situation describes your coffee drinking experience, you may choose a number closer to the center (e.g., 3).
radio.row: I like to experiment with my coffee at home
I like to try new coffee experiences
I like to buy coffee at a coffee shop
I am willing to pay more for a quality coffee experience

radio.label: Agreement
radio.title:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure Agreement (RCDA)
Congratulations!
Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve Confidential Information and you must agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you will not be eligible to participate in this study. By signing this agreement, you agree as follows:
You will use information or material disclosed to you or which may be available as part of this study only for the purpose of participating in this study, and you will not otherwise use the information or material for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
You agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
You agree that Behaviorally (and its partners) will be irreparably harmed and monetary damages may not be adequate compensation if you fail to meet your obligations under this agreement, and that, in addition to other remedies, Behaviorally (or its partners) shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief to prevent any threatened or continued breach. The parties hereby waive any requirements for security for obtaining any provisional relief.
Each of Behaviorally’s partners is an intended third-party beneficiary of this agreement and each partner may enforce the terms of this agreement.
As further detailed in our privacy policy (https://www.behaviorally.com/privacy-policy), we take reasonable precautions to protect the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey. All information collected as part of this survey is treated in accordance with our online privacy policy and is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey. You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

radio.label: Q_RE
radio.title:
We would like to use your computer's webcam to record your eye movement. By recording people, our client, Behaviorally, can understand more about how people react. The video will be analysed by computer and your results will be mixed with those from other people who take part in this study. With your permission, researchers from Behaviorally may view the video to check everything is working correctly and to understand more about how people react. The technology used is provided by our trusted partner RealEye. Your data will be processed and kept securely in accordance with the RealEye Privacy Policy.
By consenting to share your eye movements, you are granting Behaviorally permission to analyze your reaction.
By answering YES, you are agreeing that you have agreed to have to your eye movements recorded via your web cam. This video will only be used for market research and analysis purposes associated with this Project and will not be shared in any public domain.
Do you agree to be recorded?
radio.row: Yes, I agree, and I accept that researchers view my video
No, I do not agree to be recorded

You will be asked to turn on your webcam on the next page.
Your face and your background will not be recorded.
Just so you know - only the green dot area is being looked at for movement as you engage with our content.

block.label: EyeFlowShelf

html.label: Maximize1
html.strong:
Throughout this survey, you are going to be shown several pictures. Please be sure that you maximise your window at this time, such that you can see these pictures with as much clarity as possible.
Press F11 for full screen.

block.html:
Please assume you are doing your shopping from the category shown on your screen.
On this shopping trip, you can navigate the shelf and un-blur products which catch your attention.
To start the navigation, please click on the 1st product that attracts you. You can then continue to navigate the shelf by un-blurring further products of interest.
When finished with the exercise, all you need to do is click on the image one more time.
If you are ready, please click on the "Continue" button.

You are going see shelves from your local store. Assume you are doing your shopping.
Spend as much or as little time on each. When you’re ready to move on to the next shelf, press the spacebar.
Please remain seated and keep your head still as you look at each shelf.
Here is another image. Remember to click/touch the image to start the exercise.

survey.html:
Shelf Exercise Explanation:
In this exercise shoppers are asked to shop the test category as if they would actually be in their usual store, doing their purchases. For this, the category shelf is shown to shoppers again and respondents can zoom in on the shelf to see the products in greater detail. Shoppers can also click on individual products to enlarge them and either purchase them or put them back on shelf.

number.label: P_QuantityPurchased
number.title: Assume for a moment that you are doing your shopping at this shelf. Please select the products that you wish to purchase by clicking on the individual products on the shelf. You may purchase as many or as few products as you like.

div.ul:
If you would like to see a close-up of a product, hover your mouse over the product.
If you would like to purchase a product, click on the product and use the "+/-" buttons to add quantity and click "Purchase"
To change your mind about purchasing a product, click on the "back" button or click on the shopping cart to remove products.
When finished with the shopping trip, click the "continue" button on the bottom of your screen.
Please be sure to view the entire shelf before proceeding. You may need to scroll over/down to do so.

block.label: Findability_Section
block.builder:title: Findability Section
block.html:
Next, you are going to see the display of products again.
This time, you will be looking for one particular item.
When you see the display, please find [pipe: Finda].
When you find this product, please use your mouse, and click on the center of the product to select it. When you are ready, click continue to begin

number.label: F1
number.title:
Again, you are looking for:
[pipe: Finda upper]

radio.label: F1_Item_Found
radio.title: Product Found

radio.label: vFindCorrect
radio.exec: if (Version.r1 and F1.c1.r43.val >0) or (Version.r2 and F1.c1.r46.val >0) or (Version.r3 and F1.c1.r47.val >0) or (Version.r1 and F1.c1.r23_3.val >0) or (Version.r2 and F1.c1.r21_3.val >0) or (Version.r3 and F1.c1.r18_3.val >0): vFindCorrect.val = 0 else: vFindCorrect.val = 1

radio.label: EaseOfFind
radio.title: How easy or difficult do you think it was to find this product?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to find

textarea.label: Q_EaseofFind_OE
textarea.title: What specifically about this aisle layout made it [pipe: EaseOfFind] [pipe: Finda]?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

radio.label: Q_EasiertoFind
radio.title: What adjustments could be made to this aisle to make it easier for you to find [pipe: Finda]?
radio.row: More canisters of the product on shelf
Different packaging that makes it stand out

textarea.label: EasiertoFind_OE
textarea.title: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

radio.label: Q_NewDiff
radio.title: During your shopping trip, did you notice anything new or different?

textarea.label: Q_Diff_OE
textarea.title: What did you notice that was new or different?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

checkbox.label: Q_Factor
checkbox.title: When you are shopping for refrigerated coffee creamers, which factors do you find to be important in making the choice of which product to purchase?

row.label: r1
row.autofill: P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r42 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r43 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r44 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r22_3 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r23_3 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r24_3

row.label: r2
row.autofill: P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r45 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r46 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r20_3 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r21_3

row.label: r3
row.autofill: P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r47 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r48 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r18_3 or P_QuantityPurchased.c1.r19_3

checkbox.label: Q_PurchaseDriver_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Please select from the following statements the reason(s) you decided to purchase [loopvar: lb] during this shopping trip.
checkbox.row: Looked like it would sweeten my coffee
Looked like it would cream/whiten my coffee
Looked like it would be the right texture
Looked like it had better ingredients
Looked like it was healthier/better for me
Had certifications I look for (e.g., Non-GMO, Organic)
Looked like it was sustainably sourced/produced

radio.label: Q_EaseOfShop
radio.title: How easy or difficult was it for you to find the product(s) you wanted to purchase during this shopping trip?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to find

textarea.label: Q_Reason_OE
textarea.title: What specifically about this aisle layout made it [pipe: Q_EaseOfShop lower] for you to find the products you wanted?

comment.em: Please be as detailed and as thorough as possible.

radio.label: Q_OA_Aisle
radio.comment: What is your overall opinion of the aisle you just shopped?
radio.row: It was easy to understand where products were located
It was organized in a way that was easy to navigate
It allowed me to see new products I was not aware of
It was difficult to understand where products were located
It was organized in a way that was difficult to navigate
It allowed me to discover new brands of the same product I typically use
It allowed me to discover new products of the same brand I typically use

radio.label: Straightliner_Aisle
radio.title: DO NOT REMOVE OR MODIFY - Straightliner Punch - Just Tracking for OA_Aisle

em.strong: Please focus on the product in front of you as you answer the next few questions.

checkbox.label: Q_RecallProd
checkbox.title: Do you recall seeing any of these product while shopping the store?

textarea.label: Q_LocOnShelf
textarea.title: Describe the location of this product on the shelf.
textarea.comment:
[pipe: RecallProd_IMG2]
Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

radio.label: Q_ExpectToFind
radio.title: When shopping, were these products where you would expect to find them?

textarea.label: Q_ExpectToFind_OE1
textarea.title: Why did you expect to find the product in this location?

comment.em: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

textarea.label: Q_ExpectToFind_OE2
textarea.title: Where in the aisle would you expect to find these products?

comment.em: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

radio.label: Q_PI
radio.title: How likely would you be to buy these [pipe: Brand] products, if they were available for the prices below?

strong.em: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes…

checkbox.label: C_STORE
checkbox.title: Where do you typically buy refrigerated coffee creamer?
checkbox.row: At a physical store only (like a pharmacy, grocery store or mass merchandiser)
Mostly online and occasionally at a physical store
Mostly at a physical store and occasionally online
Both online and at a physical store equally

checkbox.label: C_Devices
checkbox.cond: C_STORE.r2 or C_STORE.r3 or C_STORE.r4 or C_STORE.r5
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought refrigerated coffee creamer online, what devices do you use to shop for refrigerated coffee creamer online?

radio.label: C_Location
radio.title: Where would you expect Cold Foam Creamers to be shelved at your local grocery store?
radio.row: Placed next to canisters of whipped cream
Placed with its respective brand of refrigerated liquid creamers
Grouped together in a separate section next to refrigerated liquid creamers (away from whipped cream)
Placed with canned/bottled/cartons of refrigerated coffee

textarea.label: LocationOE
textarea.title: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

checkbox.label: C_OnlineStores
checkbox.cond: C_STORE.r2 or C_STORE.r3 or C_STORE.r4 or C_STORE.r5
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought refrigerated coffee creamer online, where specifically?

checkbox.label: C_Delivery
checkbox.cond: C_STORE.r2 or C_STORE.r3 or C_STORE.r4 or C_STORE.r5
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought refrigerated coffee creamer online, how do you usually get the refrigerated coffee creamer product after you buy it?
checkbox.row: Buy online and pick up at the store
Buy online and get it delivered to my home
Buy online and get it delivered to my work
Buy online and get it delivered to a locker or place where I can pick it up

checkbox.label: C_Store
checkbox.title: When buying coffee from a coffee shop, where do you typically go?

checkbox.label: C_Type
checkbox.title: Which of the following types of coffee do you typically drink?

select.label: S_State
select.title: Please select the US state in which you currently live.

select.label: C_Employment
select.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?

select.label: STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
select.choice: Other post high school vocational training
Completed some college, but no degree
Completed some graduate, but no degree

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
